name: unpackerr
tagline: An automated extractor for completed media downloads
description: Unpackerr is a self-hosted daemon that monitors Sonarr, Radarr, and similar apps and automatically extracts completed downloads. It runs unattended and integrates into existing media automation setups.

features.title: Automatic Extraction
features.description: Extract compressed downloads automatically when Sonarr or Radarr mark them complete

features.title: Multi
features.description: Monitor Sonarr, Radarr, Lidarr, Readarr, and Whisparr simultaneously

features.title: Archive Formats
features.description: Support RAR, ZIP, 7z, and other common archive formats for extraction

features.title: Background Operation
features.description: Run as a daemon in the background without user intervention

features.title: Cleanup
features.description: Optionally delete archive files after successful extraction to save disk space

features.title: REST API
features.description: Watch for download completion events via API integration with Arr apps

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Extract multiple archives simultaneously for faster processing

features.title: Error Handling
features.description: Retry failed extractions and log errors for troubleshooting
